summary: In some levels I don’t want to see the Captain Marvel trailer. It’s going to give me hopes than then the MCU is going to crash...
body:
In some levels I don’t want to see the Captain Marvel trailer. It’s going to give me hopes than then the MCU is going to crash in A4.

Also I see coming the hate towards Tony, even though he and Captain Marvel are best friends. It make my heart ache.

I really want this to be over, like have a ending so I can’t rewatch the movies without thinking “are they gonna die???” and also so I can stop beeing on edge with everything MCU related

I really want this to be over, like have a ending so I can’t rewatch the movies without thinking “are they gonna die???” and also so I can stop beeing on edge with everything MCU related
trail.content:
In some levels I don’t want to see the Captain Marvel trailer. It’s going to give me hopes than then the MCU is going to crash in A4.

Also I see coming the hate towards Tony, even though he and Captain Marvel are best friends. It make my heart ache.

I really want this to be over, like have a ending so I can’t rewatch the movies without thinking “are they gonna die???” and also so I can stop beeing on edge with everything MCU related

blog.name: dualredundancy
blog.title: Dual Redundancy
blog.description:
A weekly podcast about television and entertainment news from David Allen, John Berwick and Kyle Bridger. 
Subscribe to us on iTunes! 
http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/dual-redundancy/id462378352  Be sure to check out our blog too at http://www.dualredundancy.com/

summary: Podcast Episode 216: Kidding Series Premiere and Castle Rock Season 1
title: Podcast Episode 216: Kidding Series Premiere and Castle Rock Season 1
excerpt: In this week's episode David, John and Kyle discuss a pulled YouTube ad for The Nun (1:55) and the demand from Marvel fans for a Captain Marvel trailer (6:10). We also discuss how the song “Scotty Doesn’t Know” saved someone from entering a coma (15:00) and the proposed TV series based on “Hey There Delilah” from the Plain White T’s (19:20). Finally, we review the series premiere of Kidding entitled “Green Means Go” (26:50) and all of season one of Castle Rock including the finale “Romans” (36:45).

blog.name: thehufflepuffjedihero
blog.title: Life is boring. So I joined Tumblr.
blog.description:
Liv, 19, Obviously a Hufflepuff

Ask Box is always open!

Is there a theme for this blog? Yeah, it’s whatever the fuck I wanna post lmao

body:
Things I want in Avengers 4

  • Coulson to see the Avengers again
  • Bruce and Hulk to be separate
  • Nebula to be the one to defeat Thanos
  • Valkyrie to show up
  • As well as Korg
  • Tony to have a kid
  • Scott and Hope be willing to help the Avengers
  • And Hank being at least okay with it
  • A grieving Quill, cause that boy needs to let it out
  • But him determined to do things that would make Gamora proud (dead or alive)
  • A grieving Thor, cause that boy also needs to let it out
  • A grieving Tony, cause he definitely needs to let it out
  • Everyone grieving really, nothing wrong with letting it out
  • Clint getting the respect he deserves
  • But I want him to retire for good to be with his family
  • And everyone is invited to his house anytime
  • Steve apologizing to Tony
  • Tony apologizing to Steve
  • And they become friends again
  • A peaceful Bucky
  • And he stays in Wakanda because that’s where I think he’ll be the happiest
  • Wanda accepting who she is
  • But I want her apologize to everyone she affected in Age of Ultron, ESSPECIALLY Bruce
  • Bruce to be the one to confront Thaddeus Ross when the Avengers want to get rid of the Accords
  • Natasha understanding that she is good and she does have a family with the Avengers
  • Tony and Peter to be reunited with a good hug
  • Sam taking Steve’s place as the leader of the Avengers, cause he has been with Steve for years and deserves to continue his leadership
  • If Steve or Tony have to die, then it has to be a sacrifice. That’s the only way I see them going out.
  • Hope for Carol Danvers as the future leader of the MCU
  • In conclusion, even if it’s a long shot, a satisfying conclusion for our current characters

  • Coulson to see the Avengers again
  • Bruce and Hulk to be separate
  • Nebula to be the one to defeat Thanos
  • Valkyrie to show up
  • As well as Korg

  • But I want her apologize to everyone she affected in Age of Ultron, ESSPECIALLY Bruce

  • Hope for Carol Danvers as the future leader of the MCU

blog.description: FRED the ALIEN is the brainchild of one, but raised by many. We are a multi-platform production company, who dabble in videos (YouTube), podcasting (SoundCloud), and the stage. Based in Melbourne's west, we pride ourselves on content that entertains, provokes, critiques, amuses...

title: A Podcast Called FRED #35
body:
A Podcast Called FRED #35

Join Kendall and Phillip for the latest in pop culture and entertainment news in the podcast that refuses to behave—it’s A Podcast Called FRED!

Nerdy News includes:

  • Captain Marvel trailer debuts this week;
  • Elizabeth Tulloch cast as Lois Lane in Arrowverse;
  • Aaron Paul joins the cast of Westworld Season 3;
  • and more!

Trailer Park discussions:

  • The Chilling Adventures of Sabrina
  • Wildlife
